title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Development of Self-Regulated Learning Strategies for High School English Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four elements of self-regulated learning (SRL): self-awareness, goal orientation, flexibility, and strategy utilization
Learners can diagnose personal learning weaknesses and develop customized learning plans to address them
Learners can apply three evidence-based learning strategies specialized for the HSEE mathematics domain to real-world problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
